home.lead: Play your favorite board games with friends or other players around the world!.
home.lead2: Join the coolest board game community on the web. Start directly from your browser. No downloads or setup necessary.

big-bazar.name: Big Bazar
big-bazar.summary: Send your assistants through the shops of Big Bazar as you race to acquire rubies.
big-bazar.description: There's hustle and bustle at Big Bazar as merchants and their assistants rush through the narrow alleys in their attempt to be more successful than their competitors. Everything must be well organized: wheelbarrows must be filled with goods at the warehouses, then swiftly transported by the assistants to various destinations. Your goal? Be the first merchant to collect a certain number of rubies.

gwt.name: Ranchers Of The Old West
gwt.summary:
Herd your cattle along the trails of the Old West. Inspired by the popular game Great Western Trail.
Join Discord server
gwt.description:
America in the 19th century: You are a rancher and repeatedly herd your cattle from Texas to Kansas City, from where you send them off by train. This earns you money and victory points.
Needless to say: Each time you arrive in Kansas City, you want to have your most valuable cattle in tow. This will not only require that you keep your herd in good shape, but also that you effectively utilize the various buildings along the trail.
Success will require that you hire capable staff: Cowboys to improve your herd, craftsmen to build your very own buildings and engineers to manage the important railroad line.

If you cleverly manage your herd and navigate the opportunities and pitfalls of this great western trail, you surely will gain the most victory points and win the game.

power-grid.name: Power Grid
power-grid.summary: Build your electricity network by investing in power plants, connecting cities and producing power to make a profit.

in-game-menu.confirmLeave: After leaving the table, you cannot rejoin and continue playing at this table!

The game will continue if there are still enough players left.

Are you sure you want to join this table?

about.title: About
about.text: This website is maintained by Tom Wetjens. I am a software developer by day and board gamer by night. The idea for this website came during the lockdown due to the Corona virus in 2020. As playing board games with friends in real life was no longer possible, I started looking at other ways.

specialThanks.title: Special Thanks
specialThanks.text: My wife Sharon for the patience and testing. Gerben, Niels, Erik, Judith, Irene also for testing. Sander for testing and making sound effects and songs.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: This website is maintained by Tom Wetjens. Feel free to contact me about any issues, requests or suggestions. As there is currently no issue tracker yet, please submit any bug reports to my e-mail address.

minMaxNumberOfPlayers: {{cur}} players - needs at least {{min}} players (at most {{max}})

errors.EXCEEDS_MAX_REALTIME_GAMES: You have reached the maximum number of realtime games you can play simultaneously.
errors.EXCEEDS_MAX_ACTIVE_GAMES: You have reached the maximum number of games you can play simultaneously.
errors.CANNOT_INVITE_REACHED_MAX_ACTIVE_GAMES: This user has reached the maximum number of simultaneous games and cannot be invited.
errors.MIN_PLAYERS: You need more players to start the game.
errors.SERVER_NOT_AVAILABLE: The server is currently not available or too busy.
errors.CONNECTION_FAILED: Could not connect to server. Make sure you are not offline.
errors.FORBIDDEN: You are not allowed to perform the requested action or access the requested resource.
errors.ALREADY_INVITED: This user is already invited to the table.
errors.NOT_PLAYER_IN_GAME: You are not playing at this table.
errors.EXCEEDS_MAX_PLAYERS: You have reached the maximum number of players for this game.
errors.COMPUTER_NOT_SUPPORTED: This game does not support computer players.
errors.TOKEN_VALIDATION_ERROR: Login failed due to expired token. Make sure your system's clock is set correctly.
errors.RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND: The requested resource was not found.
errors.HISTORY_NOT_AVAILABLE: There is not enough historic data available to undo the previous action.
errors.CANNOT_UNDO: The previous action cannot be undone.
errors.NOT_PUBLIC: You must be invited to join this table.
errors.MUST_BE_OWNER: You must be the host of this table.
errors.EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE: There is already another user registered with this e-mail address.
errors.NOT_FOUND: The requested resource was not found.
errors.CANNOT_KICK: The player cannot be kicked at this moment. Wait until sufficient time has passed to give the player a chance to respond.

log.PROPOSED_TO_LEAVE: proposes to leave the table together
